name: Burg (itch)
description:
Use WASD to move!

Burg is a flatgame I made in a few hours for FLATJAM 2018: https://itch.io/jam/flatjam2018.

It is based on my somewhat lonely experiences going home for the holidays in 2018. I drew the art with crayons. I performed the music with my Casio WK-110 keyboard and recorded it with my  smartphone. I put the assets together in Unity with the help of this tutorial: https://flatgame.itch.io/first-timers-tutorial.
